ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:23:48 [Issue ID 4000-468934] urn:comicvine:4000-468934 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 17:46:10. [Issue ID 1832932]
ComicInfo.Summary: A collection of new short stories by some of the best in the business, plus many more names to be announced. This anthology is part of the United Kingdom's Thought Bubble Festival which takes place in Leeds, Northern England from 9-16 November 2014. All profits from this comic go to Barnardo's, one of the largest children's charities in the UK.
ComicInfo.Title: Space Hype; A Selection of Stories I Made Up As a Kid; A Mermaid's Tale; As Above; Odie the Superdog; Viking the Worrier; The World of Oliver; TV Science Documentary; Lac in Black; Have a Nice Day; Untitled; Jampires Present Comics Jamtastic; Morning in Europa; Mouse; A Letter To the Sixteen-Year-Old; When the Night Comes; The Day of the Incredibly Messed Up Thing; 2014 Thought Bubble Festival Anthology Contents
